headline: Warren Buffett Generated Double The Market's Returns—Until Regulation Changed The Game
summary: Social Capital founder Chamath Palihapitiya highlighted a striking pattern in Warren Buffett‘s investment performance, revealing how regulatory changes fundamentally altered returns for even the world’s best investors. Berkshire Hathaway’s Alpha Vanished After 2000 Regulatory Shift Speaking with Jason Calacanis on the All-In Podcast episode released Saturday, Palihapitiya shared data showing that Warren Buffett generated twice the market's returns before the implementation of Regulation Fair Dis

headline: US Could Soon Enter A 'Debt Spiral', Exceeding Post-World War II Debt-To-GDP Record By 2030, Watchdog Says
summary: The U.S. is approaching a critical fiscal point as its federal debt is projected to surpass historical levels, raising alarms about the country’s economic stability. What Is The CBO Saying? The U.S. federal debt is on track to surpass a significant milestone, with projections indicating a troubling fiscal future. headline: Should AT&T’s New AWS and Amazon LEO Connectivity Alliance Require Action From AT&T (T) Investors?
summary: Earlier this month, AT&T, Amazon Web Services and Amazon Leo announced a collaboration to pair AT&T’s fiber network with AWS cloud and AI tools, while using Amazon Leo’s low Earth orbit satellites to extend fixed broadband connectivity for business customers across the U.S. The partnership effectively ties AT&T’s physical network footprint into AWS’s cloud and Amazon Leo’s satellite capabilities, potentially reshaping how enterprises access resilient, hybrid connectivity and compute...

headline: The Wrong Way—and Right Way—to Hedge This Volatile Stock Market
summary: Most investors stink at hedging—even the pros. They mostly buy puts near a stock’s current price, thinking they will make lots of money if it declines even more.

content.title: The Wrong Way—and Right Way—to Hedge This Volatile Stock Market
content.summary: Most investors stink at hedging—even the pros. They mostly buy puts near a stock’s current price, thinking they will make lots of money if it declines even more.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Slashes Stake in Amazon by More Than 75%
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway slashed its stake in Amazon by more than 75% in the fourth quarter, while also building a stake in the New York Times, his last new bet as chief executive officer of the conglomerate. Bloomberg's Abeer Abu Omar reports.

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway Slashes Stake in Amazon by More Than 75%
content.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway slashed its stake in Amazon by more than 75% in the fourth quarter, while also building a stake in the New York Times, his last new bet as chief executive officer of the conglomerate. Bloomberg's Abeer Abu Omar reports.
content.summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway slashed its stake in Amazon by more than 75% in the fourth quarter, while also building a stake in the New York Times, his last new bet as chief executive officer of the conglomerate. Bloomberg's Abeer Abu Omar reports.

headline: New York Times Stock Rallies on Berkshire Hathaway Stake-Building
summary: Shares in the New York Times rose after Berkshire Hathaway said it added a position in the media company and sold shares in Bank of America, Apple and Amazon.  Berkshire bought 5.1 million shares of the New York Times during the December quarter, Warren Buffett’s last few months as chief executive.  It sold stock in Apple, marking the third-straight period it cut its stake in the iPhone maker.

content.title: New York Times Stock Rallies on Berkshire Hathaway Stake-Building
content.summary: Shares in the New York Times rose after Berkshire Hathaway said it added a position in the media company and sold shares in Bank of America, Apple and Amazon.  Berkshire bought 5.1 million shares of the New York Times during the December quarter, Warren Buffett’s last few months as chief executive.  It sold stock in Apple, marking the third-straight period it cut its stake in the iPhone maker.
